Tag_Imageneed.description: ''[[The Fate of Atlantis | Assassin's Creed: Odyssey — The Fate of Atlantis]]''

MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' - 'The Fate of Atlantis: Torment of Hades'
MemoryInfobox.location: Stables of the Immortal Stallions, The Scorched Lands, the Underworld

General_Description: '''Bad Copycat''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''Impious {{Wiki|Salmoneus}} wanted to be treated like a god, but his foolish impersonations only tempted the real gods to smite him. Their might scorched an entire [[Salmoneus' Hubris|village]] to the north, leaving nothing but a hollow crater. I now lie in waiting in scorched remains.''
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]'' - ''[[The Fate of Atlantis: Torment of Hades]]''
